name: Bathala
description:
Bathala is a top down wave based survival game that takes place inside the temple of Bathala. Your goal is to protect the statue of Bathala the only problem is you have no weapons... Not to worry though the temple is full of debris and ancient relics, I'm sure you will figure something out. Have fun!

Controls
  • Movement - WASD
  • Attack / Pickup - LMB
  • Attacks are directed towards the cursor
Credit
  • Art by  @NumiLumi
  • Programming by  @Ltven0mI
